SELECT pom.id,pom.company_s_name,pom.platform_service_provider,pom.payment_inventory, pom.acceptance_certificate,pom.many_payment,pom.payment_order_status,pom.payment_date,pom.real_money, t.task_code,t.task_name,t.release_date,t.deadline_date,t.industry_type FROM tb_payment_order_many as pom LEFT JOIN tb_task as t ON pom.task_id=t.id WHERE pom.id=#{id}

SELECT a.id, b.company_s_name, b.platform_service_provider, b.company_contract, b.payment_inventory, b.task_id, b.acceptance_certificate, b.many_payment, b.payment_date, a.real_money FROM tb_payment_inventory a JOIN tb_payment_order_many b ON a.payment_order_id = b.id WHERE YEAR(a.create_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(a.create_date) = #{month} AND a.worker_id = #{workerId}

SELECT pom.id, pom.platform_service_provider, pom.company_contract, pom.payment_inventory, pom.task_id, pom.acceptance_certificate, pom.payment_order_status, pom.payment_mode, pom.real_money, pom.create_date, pom.many_payment, pom.task_name, pom.task_type, ci.company_name, ci.bank_name AS payment_bank_name, ci.bank_code AS payment_bank_code, tp.payee, tp.bank_name AS payee_bank_name, tp.bank_code AS payee_bank_code FROM tb_payment_order_many pom LEFT JOIN tb_tax_package tp ON pom.tax_id = tp.tax_id AND tp.package_status = 1 LEFT JOIN tb_company_info ci ON pom.company_id = ci.id WHERE pom.id = #{paymentOrderId}
